entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:27 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 2:53 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.6°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -17.3°C
Wind: NW 28 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
